title: The Wait Is Over: Milan-San Remo Added to Women’s Calendar after 20-Year Hiatus
content:
Prestigious Italian monument added to 2025 Women’s WorldTour calendar, UCI rolls out tweaks to U23 men’s and women’s championship racing.

Read the full article at The Wait Is Over: Milan-San Remo Added to Women’s Calendar after 20-Year Hiatus on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
